TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit GeneralTransform3D extends System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable implements class System.IFormattable
Public MustInherit Class GeneralTransform3D Inherits Animatable Implements IFormattable
public ref class GeneralTransform3D abstract : System::Windows::Media::Animation::Animatable, IFormattable
type GeneralTransform3D = class inherit Animatable interface IFormattable

Docs.summary: Provides generalized transformation support for 3-D objects.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 透過 3d 物件之間的轉換進行<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D.TransformToAncestor%2A>並<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D.TransformToDescendant%2A>方法，這兩者會傳回<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D>物件。 在 3d 之間的轉換物件可能代表 4x4 矩陣的案例中，方法會傳回的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D>類別。 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D>類別可以轉換<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>要<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>並<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D>來<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D>。
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D Clone() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable clone of this , making deep copies of this object's values.
Docs.returns: A modifiable clone of the current object. The cloned object's property is even if the source's property is

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽的強型別實作繼承的版本。
如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。
當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （它們可能已不再解析），但不是動畫或其目前值。
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D.Clone%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D CloneCurrentValue() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable clone of this object, making deep copies of this object's current values. Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
Docs.returns: A modifiable clone of the current object. The cloned object's property is even if the source's property is .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽的強型別實作繼承的版本。
如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D.CloneCurrentValue%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

The provider to use to format the value. -or- A null reference ( in Visual Basic) to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.IFormattable> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D.System%23IFormattable%23ToString%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

Public MustOverride Function TransformBounds (rect As Rect3D) As Rect3D

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, transforms the specified 3-D bounding box and returns an axis-aligned 3-D bounding box that is exactly large enough to contain it.
Docs.returns: The smallest axis-aligned 3-D bounding box possible that contains the transformed .

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D.TransformBounds%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

Public MustOverride Function TryTransform (inPoint As Point3D, ByRef result As Point3D) As Boolean
public: abstract bool TryTransform(System::Windows::Media::Media3D::Point3D inPoint, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Windows::Media::Media3D::Point3D % result);

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, attempts to transform the specified 3-D point and returns a value that indicates whether the transformation was successful.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 不同於<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D.Transform%2A>方法，這個方法不會擲回例外狀況，如果轉換失敗。
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D.TryTransform%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。
